name: Boss on the edge
description:
(FULL SCREEN RECCOMENDED!)

Controls:

Arrow keys to move

Space to jump

R to restart a stage

Story:

Some big mean cat has a reality check literally right after causing mass destruction and goes to the edge of a cliff to stare at the view and question its life choices. You, the player, saw this destruction from afar and now have to put the cat to a stop! How so? Stabbing? Shooting? NO! By getting strong and pushing that meowing menace off the ledge of course! On this journey you'll have push boxes, dodge some other jerks, lift weights and as I said before... get buff as heck!
